Class ScoreTracker

java.lang.Object
model.ScoreTracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class ScoreTracker extends Object implements Observer
'observer' of the 'Player model, tracks the number of InteractableObject opened, provides card sequence checkers and has various computing utility methods to get the total points. used in ResultScreenView, so that the view layer doesn't have to compute stuff.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      the ScoreTracker tracks the player's (observable) total interactable object searches through the observer pattern whener the interactable object gets opened, fires an event to notify this object
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      o - the observable object, in this case it is Player
      arg - an argument passed to the notifyObservers method, in this case the arguments are strings given by the interactable objects

    • getCardValues

      public List<Integer> getCardValues(Player player)
      returns a list of the values of the current player's inventory player cards
      Parameters:
      player - current instance of the player
      Returns:
      returns a list of poker cards values (integers).

    • checkIsStraight

      public boolean checkIsStraight(List<Integer> pokerCardValues)
      checks if the player's cards form a 'straight'
      Parameters:
      pokerCardValues - list of Integers, that represent the card values
      Returns:
      true if the 5 cards represent a 'straight' (5 consecutive cards ex 1 2 3 4 5); also handles the ace-low and ace-high edge cases.

    • checkIsFourOfAKind

      public boolean checkIsFourOfAKind(List<Integer> pokerCardValues)
      checks if the player's cards are '4 of a single kind' (ex. 1 heart, 2 heart, 3 heart, 4 heart)
      Parameters:
      pokerCardValues - list of player card values
      Returns:
      true if the cards are '4 of a kind'

    • checkIsThreeOfAKind

      public boolean checkIsThreeOfAKind(List<Integer> pokerCardValues)
      checks if the player's cards are '3 of a kind'
      Parameters:
      pokerCardValues - list of players card values
      Returns:
      true if cards are '3 of a kind'

    • checkIsTwopair

      public boolean checkIsTwopair(List<Integer> pokerCardValues)
      checks if there is a '2 pair' sequence in the player's cards
      Parameters:
      pokerCardValues - list of player card values
      Returns:
      true if there are 2 pairs of the same card, a single pair is true if both are the same value.

    • checkIsAllFaceCards

      public boolean checkIsAllFaceCards(List<Integer> pokerCardValues)
      checks is all 5 cards are all face cards. (ex j, j, q, q, k would return true)
      Parameters:
      pokerCardValues - card values
      Returns:
      true if 'is all face cards'

    • getPaperBoxTotalPoints

      public int getPaperBoxTotalPoints()
      Returns:
      number of PaperBox opened * 100 (pts)

    • getRedBoxesTotalPoints

      public int getRedBoxesTotalPoints()
      Returns:
      number of RedBox opened *1000 (pts)

    • getMetalLockersTotalPoints

      public int getMetalLockersTotalPoints()
      Returns:
      number of MetalLocker opened *500 (pts)

    • getWoodLockersTotalPoints

      public int getWoodLockersTotalPoints()
      Returns:
      number of WoodLocker opened *250 (pts)

    • getPokerCardsTotalPoints

      public int getPokerCardsTotalPoints(List<Integer> pokerCardValues)
      returns total points acquired through the player cards
      Parameters:
      pokerCardValues - player card values
      Returns:
      total sum of the card values * 1000

    • getObjectPoints

      public int getObjectPoints()
      returns total points got from the interactable objects
      Returns:
      total points got from the interactable objects opened

    • getTotalPoints

      public int getTotalPoints(List<Integer> pokerCardValues)
      returns total points given by interactable objects + total poker cards points
      Parameters:
      pokerCardValues - list of player card values
      Returns:
      total points given by interactable objects + total poker cards points

    • getGrandTotalPoints

      public int getGrandTotalPoints(List<Integer> pokerCardValues)
      computes the grand total points, and adds them to the Leaderboard .txt file. the name is fetched from WhatsYourNameController class.
      Parameters:
      pokerCardValues - list of card values
      Returns:
      grand total points: the total points of the player and multiplies them if they are checkIsStraight(List), checkIsAllFaceCards(List), checkIsFourOfAKind(List),
      invalid @link 
      {@link #checkIsThreeOfAKind(List),
      checkIsTwopair(List)
